email.subject: Variable Bonus Update
email.body:
Hi All,
Here is an update on the Variable Bonus for the year 2023. We have made few enhancements in evaluating the performance review process making it more efficient and transparent.
We are at the verge of finalizing the variable bonus for all the eligible employees and we'll send out a communication on the same, next week.
Please make a note that the disbursement of Variable Bonus will occur in the second week of April.
